channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Come back or move on? Fired federal workers face choices now that a judge wants them rehired
item.description: After a judge ordered the Trump administration to rehire thousands of probationary workers who were fired in a dramatic downsizing of the U.S. government, many have been asked to return to work only to be put on administrative leave, or offered early retirement.

item.title: 12 dozen lawmakers accused in 8 years. Women in the statehouse weigh #MeToo’s impact
Body camera footage is released showing scene outside Gene Hackman’s home
